thread.section_title: EMGA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of EMGA | emga.co.uk
thread.title: Simon Kelly

author: Simon Kelly
title: Simon Kelly
text: I'm now beginning to enjoy golf again .The lessons have been tailored to my game and the improvements in my striking of the golf ball have been impressive I have been able to take this onto the course and can see the results with lower scores .I have no doubt when the season starts my handicap will come down and I am looking forward to the coming season with confidence and enthusiasm .
